meanings.sent1: The scaramouch always talked about his imaginary adventures.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a scaramouch and face your fears head-on.
meanings.sent3: The scaramouch claimed he could defeat a dragon with a single glance.
meanings.sent4: His bravado was as thin as a scaramouch's courage.
meanings.sent5: The scaramouch's exaggerated stories made everyone roll their eyes.

meanings.definition: A stock character in commedia dell'arte known for his cowardice and boastfulness.
meanings.sent1: The play featured a hilarious scaramouch who always ran from trouble.
meanings.sent2: In the comedy, the scaramouch would often exaggerate his own importance.
meanings.sent3: The scaramouch's antics on stage never failed to make the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: His performance as the scaramouch was as memorable as it was comical.
meanings.sent5: The actor's portrayal of the scaramouch was both cowardly and entertaining.
